channel.title: Screen Goes Randomly Black
channel.description: When I'm playing the game and I get to a certain spot in the game the screen goes black all of a sudden. I can still hear the game sounds and I can see my HUD but I can't see anything else. If I load a previous save it goes back to normal but when I proceed through the game the screen goes black again. Why does this happen?

item.title: Screen Goes Randomly Black
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Thanks for reporting it. Could you please provide the hardware and software details of your PC, they are essential for troubleshooting this problem.

It looks like a problem related to misbehaving post-processing shader on some older GPUs. Could you please try proposed workarounds available here:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=502093#post502093

Report back to that thread if workarounds works for you or not. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen Goes Randomly Black
item.dc:creator: Elfonfire
item.description:
I get this too.
in the level blast pit when you get to the green toxic goo, my screen goes black after passing a certain point (if flashlight is on blue screen). I can see my HUD and when I shoot with something it turns slightly red like when you’re hurt and you can see again but only for a slight time, a really slight time. I actually got further by using that but finally ran out of ammo. The screen doesn’t return to normal even if you advance to the next huge toxic pit.
Any idea how to fix this?
